# Martial Law Martial Law may only be declared by Central Command. Under Martial Law Security is:
able to perform arrests, searches, and departmental raids at their discretion and without a warrant. authorised to take whatever actions deemed necessary to neutralise or repel station threats. authorized to summarily execute station threats. not bound to the [textlink="Rules of Engagement" link="RulesOfEngagement"]. not obligated to provide any medical care to prisoners and detainees, including revival.
